ygData.subject: Re: Dream site for items
ygData.msgSnippet: Re: level for items. Well, I think if you go on the basis of a person who just entered EQ and didn t have a guild or anyone else assisting... what would
ygData.messageBody:
Re: level for items.

Well, I think if you go on the basis of a person who just entered EQ and
didn't have a guild or anyone else assisting... what would actually be
attainable. I found it much easier to get items and such once I joined
my guild because of the level mix, but before I joined I had to really
plan out what I could afford, where to hunt, etc. Some things like
bronze can be bought by going to zones where the upper level folk go and
just hang out because some times they are getting a little overweight
and don't want to leave their hunting spot. Things like that should also
be mentioned. Prices for bronze items oyi.. if you are getting large
seems to be lower but that medium will be a higher prices since it can
be worn by more races. Small sizes are of course cheaper. I'm not a
good one for attaining prices from since most of my armor has been gifts
(crafted *drools* all from trades and my char's wedding gifts)

Hope that helps.



Trent Carroll wrote:

> Excellent, just the type of info was looking for. How would I
> determine level base for items? Would it be level they could be/have
> been purchased at. Average pricing I can definitely do. I could
> allow people to submit how much they paid for an item and on what
> server so that you can even get an average for the server you play
> on. Would something similar for level work? Let people input what
> level they obtained an item at and create an average?Everyone out
> there: What would your dream site for items be? What would you want
> it to contain?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: suzkim@... [mailto:suzkim@...]
> Sent: Sunday, October 17, 1999 10:10 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] items site?
> Okay,
>
> If I would have my dream site for equiptment and such
>
> Level based - what equiptment armor/weapons => someone who
> is wondering what to get at each level(s) could go there and
> see.
> Stat impoving - say I want to know how to up my stats for
> str, agi, dex, sta what weapons/armor/jewelry/misc -
> where/who/how to get plus some explinations about how each
> stat improvement can improve warrior's performance.
> Quest based - items that can only be gotten through quests
> Purchasable items - average pricing
> Player Trade/purchased - price should pay for these
>
> That site I like for the message board. Get good tips and
> such from there.
>
> Suz
>
> Trent Carroll wrote:
>
